Title: Wee Little Shenanigans
Description:
So... we bought some cheap grains in bulk. It turned out the grain was infested with sprites.

I HATE sprites. With their wee beady eyes and constant smiling.

I would like to resolve this quietly. Can I buy your services to discreetly eliminate some of these grain thieves?
CompletionText: Oh good, they didn't turn you into a frog yet. I saw them do that once you know.
RewardText: Thank you for your help stranger! Hopefully we can deal with the rest on our own from here.
